title: why didnt tsm fight?
body: why didnt tsm fight during the first baron or at all they just let baron go while having a good postion i dont understand why they let neils sit there in the base when dyrus coulda ult him and he woulda been blown up? it seems like they let themselves get beat

replies.body: They didn't fight because they're fucking pussies who're too afraid to do anything. There was NO reason for them to let Origen have that 5th dragon. Everyone on Origen's side was so low that two Jinx rockets would've killed them, not to mention Bjergsen with his low Syndra cds and insane burst. But instead of just standing their ground, they let themselves be zoned out. It's like 'man, look at that 1hp Kennen! I better not get anywhere NEAR him, what if I misclick and fail to auto-attack? Better just let him have 5 dragon buff to be safe.'

With all of the QSS's and the thresh lantern he would have gotten out without too much of an issue, they had to bait a couple of those out before engaging hard and that is where it kinda fell apart. OG was smart about not extending out too far and when they did start to lose their cooldowns they backed. Also TSM didn't have the ward coverage to chase into the jungle or around the baron/dragon most of the game which really hurt them. They needed a shorter game and they just didn't find it.

like they said u cant qss a malphite ult and u woulda been blown up from jinx plus syndra burst and the malphite ult itself should do decent damange to kogmaw dyrus was a eye sore on malphite they had everything to win and idk i woulda rushed up mid when they were starting to take top inhib because jinx would kill turrets so much faster then kogmaw
they are scared. They shouldve engage LONG ago. whoever made those calls fked up
